title: Did ‘The Simpsons’ Predict a Mass Shooting at a ‘Black Panther’ Movie Screening?
subtitle: Rumors holding that the show 'The Simpsons' predicted that there would be a mass shooting at a screening of the movie "Black Panther" were based on a doctored image.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: "The Simpsons" predicted that there would be a mass shooting at a screening of the movie "Black Panther."
